block.p: $1.85 million 79 Laight Street (Washington Street) (Sugar Warehouse) 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 2,620-sq.-ft. condo in a prewar loft building; 24-hr. doormen; windowed kitchen, beamed ceilings, marble bath, central air-conditioning, washer/dryer, 2 exposures, partial Hudson River view; exercise room and common roof deck in building; maintenance $1,296; taxes $9,540; listed at $1.895 million, 17 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

$1.85 million 79 Laight Street (Washington Street) (Sugar Warehouse) 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 2,620-sq.-ft. condo in a prewar loft building; 24-hr. doormen; windowed kitchen, beamed ceilings, marble bath, central air-conditioning, washer/dryer, 2 exposures, partial Hudson River view; exercise room and common roof deck in building; maintenance $1,296; taxes $9,540; listed at $1.895 million, 17 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

$815,000 201 East 21st Street (Quaker Ridge) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,275-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doorman; dining area, renovated eat-in kitchen, central air-conditioning, hardwood floors, 2 exposures, Gramercy Park view; maintenance $971, 37% tax-deductible; listed at $850,000, 4 weeks on market (broker: Bellmarc Realty)

$325,000 245 East 54th Street (Brevard) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 700-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge; windowed kitchen, renovated bath, hardwood floors, high floor, 2 exposures; maintenance $1,100, 54% tax-deductible; listed at $335,000, 1 week on market (brokers: Heron Residential; Lighthouse Real Estate)

$1.82 million 200 East 65th Street 2-bedroom 2 1/2-bath 1,366-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen; circular dining area, high ceilings, herringbone floors, floor-to-ceiling windows, 2 exposures; common roof deck, health club and pool in building; common charge $1,496; taxes $7,788; listed at $1.899 million, 10 weeks on market (broker: Douglas Elliman)

$465,000 360 Cabrini Boulevard (190th Street) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,150-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; part-time doormen, elevator; dining foyer, renovated kitchen with marble countertops, south and west exposures, Hudson River view; maintenance $721, 40% tax-deductible; listed at $475,000, 5 weeks on market (broker: Simone Song Properties)

$750,000 3235 Riverdale Avenue 2-family 4-story attached newly constructed brick town house; 4 bedrooms, 2 baths, dining area in each duplex unit; roof terrace in upper unit, rear patio off lower unit, attached 1-car garage, 23-by-100-ft. lot; taxes not yet assessed; listed at $750,000, 1 week on market (broker: Trebach Realty)

$975,000 37 Tompkins Place 3-bedroom, 2-bath 1,700-sq.-ft. condo in a renovated 100-year-old mansion; dining area, windowed eat-in kitchen, hardwood floors, fireplace, private patio; common charge $250; 100% tax-exempt; listed at $1.15 million, 7 weeks on market (broker: Brooklyn Bridge Realty)

$1.25 million 246 DeKalb Avenue 4-unit, 5-story brownstone; 1 bedroom, 1 bath, dining area, fireplace with marble mantel, hardwood floors, high ceilings in all units; 1,500-sq.-ft. of commercial space on ground and first floors for offices and restaurant; 21-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $6,076; listed at $1.25 million, 1 week on market (broker: Harbor View Realty)

$519,500 37 Seventh Avenue 2-bedroom, 1-bath 1,150-sq.-ft. co-op in a brownstone; two entrances to unit, kitchen with dishwasher, high ceilings, parquet floors, fireplace, living room with bay windows, rear deck, original moldings and detail, washer/dryer in unit; maintenance $650, 40% tax-deductible; listed at $529,000, 6 weeks on market (broker: Brooklyn Properties of Seventh Avenue)
